title: New Government Agency Designed To Tackle Cyber Threats More Effectively
teaser: The Obama administration is creating a new agency to gather and distribute intelligence on cyber threats more quickly. The agency is modeled after the National Counter Terrorism Center, created after Sept. 11 to improve information sharing across the U.S. government.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
